name: text-similarity-algorithm
description: ```js function lenvenshteinDistance(s, t) {     let sLen = s.length;     let tLen = t.length;     let substitutionCost = 0;     let d = [];     // 初始化     d[0] = [];     for(let i = 0; i <= tLen; i ++) d[0][i] = i;     // 打表     for(let i = 1; i <= sLen; i ++) {         d[i] = [i];         for(let j = 1; j <= tLen; j ++) {             if(s[i - 1] === t[j - 1]) {                 substitutionCost = 0;             }else substitutionCost = 1;             d[i][j] = Math.min(d[i - 1][j] + 1, d[i][j - 1] + 1, d[i - 1][j - 1] + substitutionCost)         }     }     return d[sLen][tLen]; } ```    ### After this method is tested by data, the result is:    #### There are 1318 questions and 1318 standards.    #### Correctly matched 541 questions.    #### Matching accuracy was: 0.41047040971168436 .
